page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is Fiona Gibson and i am a third year junior at Hollingbourne School. {SUNDAY 22nd. JULY 1985} I got up early, put my slippers on and went downstairs to ask mum if there was any Sunday School today. She said there was, so i got ready, found 10 pence for the collection and walked to church.My friend Amanda and i stuck some pictures of some donkeys on some card and i asked Amanda to come to my house to play. She stayed for two hours and we played with plasticene and some games Amanda had brought.We had some ice cream and then Amanda's dad came to collect her. "What would you like for dinner?" asked my mum. "Hamburger, chips and beans please," i said. I went into the sitting room and
